function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmissible diseases such as SARS-CoV-2 variants of concern (VoCs) may affect transmission rates and public health interventions","Impact":"Increased transmission and reduced effectiveness of public health interventions","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling the spread of VoCs through surveillance and targeted interventions","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing for variant identification, targeted vaccination campaigns","People":"General public, healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health authorities, public health agencies, researchers"},{"Description":"Seasonal variations in weather may impact the transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Shifts in transmission rates and patterns based on seasonal weather variations","Mitigation":"Implementing seasonal public health strategies, early detection and response to seasonal changes","Technologies":"Weather forecasting, seasonal vaccination campaigns","People":"General public, healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health authorities, public health agencies, meteorological organizations"}]}
